name: red-dead-redemption-2-map
description: A dynamic Red Dead Redemption 2 map that allows a user to place custom markers with descriptions.

scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others -p {name} -n "[ SERVER ]","[ SYNC ]" -c black.bgGreen,black.bgMagenta "npm run start" "node ./sync.js"

author: Trevor Lemon
